
snap(15,15,-20)

sky(235,255,238)
fog(242,212,206)
ground(209,194,186)
polys(207,192,178)

fadefrom(6000)
density(4)

name(Twisted Revenge)
nlaps(10)

set(47,0,0,0)p
set(10,0,5600,0)p
set(10,0,11200,0)
set(26,0,11200,0)pr
set(13,-1520,16830,30)
chk(40,-3040,19660,0)
set(12,-1520,22490,-30)p

set(10,0,28120,0)p
set(14,0,32670,-90)pt
set(20,-4550,32670,-90)p
set(15,-10150,32670,-90)p
set(15,-15750,32670,-90)
set(35,-15950,32670,-90)pr
set(15,-21350,32670,90)p
set(15,-26950,32670,90)p

set(17,-31500,32670,0)pt
set(15,-31500,28120,0)p
set(15,-31500,22520,180)p
set(15,-31500,16920,0)p
set(15,-31500,11320,0)

set(35,-31000,12170,180)

set(14,-25420,-21350,90)pt
set(10,-20870,-21350,90)p

chk(40,-4550,-21350,90)
set(14,0,-21350,180)pt
set(10,0,-16800,0)p
set(10,0,-11200,0)p
set(10,0,-5600,0)
set(26,0,-2800,0)pr


set(23,-15510,-18500,0)
set(10,-15510,-15700,180)po
set(20,-15510,-10100,180)p
set(15,-15510,-4500,180)p
set(15,-15510,1100,0)p
set(16,-15510,6700,0)p
fix(41,-15510,6700,-2000,0)s
set(15,-15510,12300,0)p

set(34,-15510,10500,0)

set(15,-15510,17900,0)
